# Load libraries
```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(janitor)
library(purrr)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(broom)
library(knitr)
library(summarytools)
`%notin%` <- Negate(`%in%`)
set.seed(73)
```

# Load data
```{r}
#create a list of the files from your target directory
file_list <- list.files(path = "./raw_data")

files = list()
for (i in 1:length(file_list)){
  path_to_file = paste0("./raw_data/", file_list[i])
  files[[i]] <- readr::read_csv(path_to_file) #each file will be read in
}
files %>% unlist()
```
